# !!! WARNING !!! AUTO-GENERATED FILE, PLEASE DO NOT MODIFY IT AND USE
# https://docs.platformio.org/page/projectconf/section_env_build.html#build-flags
#
# If you need to override existing CMake configuration or add extra,
# please create `CMakeListsUser.txt` in the root of project.
# The `CMakeListsUser.txt` will not be overwritten by PlatformIO.



set(CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES "nucleo_f401re;nucleo_f401re-9600;nucleo_f401re_debug;" CACHE STRING "Build Types reflect PlatformIO Environments" FORCE)

# Convert "Home Directory" that may contain unescaped backslashes on Windows
file(TO_CMAKE_PATH $ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH} ENV_HOME_PATH)

set(CLION_SVD_FILE_PATH "${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/platforms/ststm32/misc/svd/STM32F401xE.svd" CACHE FILEPATH "Peripheral Registers Definitions File" FORCE)

SET(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/bin/arm-none-eabi-gcc.exe")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/bin/arm-none-eabi-g++.exe")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "-Wvla -fno-rtti -std=gnu++14 -includembed_config.h -DMBED_RAM_SIZE=0x18000 -DMBED_RAM_START=0x20000000 -DMBED_ROM_SIZE=0x80000 -DMBED_ROM_START=0x8000000 -DMBED_TRAP_ERRORS_ENABLED=1 -MMD -Os -Wall -Wextra -Wno-missing-field-initializers -Wno-unused-parameter -fdata-sections -ffunction-sections -fmessage-length=0 -fno-exceptions -fomit-frame-pointer -funsigned-char -g -mcpu=cortex-m4 -mfloat-abi=softfp -mfpu=fpv4-sp-d16 -mthumb -iprefix C:/Users/jeffr/PLATFO~1/packages/FRAMEW~3 @\"${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/build/nucleo_f401re/longinc-2a697fa74ab9f15c83d079bf788a52f1\"")
SET(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "-std=gnu11 -includembed_config.h -DMBED_RAM_SIZE=0x18000 -DMBED_RAM_START=0x20000000 -DMBED_ROM_SIZE=0x80000 -DMBED_ROM_START=0x8000000 -DMBED_TRAP_ERRORS_ENABLED=1 -MMD -Os -Wall -Wextra -Wno-missing-field-initializers -Wno-unused-parameter -fdata-sections -ffunction-sections -fmessage-length=0 -fno-exceptions -fomit-frame-pointer -funsigned-char -g -mcpu=cortex-m4 -mfloat-abi=softfp -mfpu=fpv4-sp-d16 -mthumb -iprefix C:/Users/jeffr/PLATFO~1/packages/FRAMEW~3 @\"${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/build/nucleo_f401re/longinc-2a697fa74ab9f15c83d079bf788a52f1\"")

SET(CMAKE_C_STANDARD 11)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 14)

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "nucleo_f401re")
    add_definitions(-DPLATFORMIO=60107)
    add_definitions(-DSTM32F4)
    add_definitions(-DSTM32F401xE)
    add_definitions(-DSTM32F40_41xxx)
    add_definitions(-DARM_MATH_CM4)
    add_definitions(-DCOMPONENT_FLASHIAP=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_ANALOGIN=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_FLASH=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_I2C=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_I2CSLAVE=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_I2C_ASYNCH=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_INTERRUPTIN=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_LPTICKER=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_MPU=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_PORTIN=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_PORTINOUT=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_PORTOUT=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_PWMOUT=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_RESET_REASON=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_RTC=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_SERIAL=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_SERIAL_ASYNCH=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_SERIAL_FC=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_SLEEP=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_SPI=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_SPISLAVE=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_SPI_ASYNCH=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_STDIO_MESSAGES=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_USTICKER=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_WATCHDOG=1)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_CORTEX)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_CORTEX_M)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_FF_ARDUINO)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_FF_MORPHO)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_LIKE_CORTEX_M4)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_LIKE_MBED)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_M4)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_MCU_STM32)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_MCU_STM32F4)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_MCU_STM32F401xE)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_NAME=NUCLEO_F401RE)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_NUCLEO_F401RE)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_RELEASE)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_RTOS_M4_M7)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_STM)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_STM32F4)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_STM32F401xE)
    add_definitions(-DTOOLCHAIN_GCC)
    add_definitions(-DTOOLCHAIN_GCC_ARM)
    add_definitions(-DTRANSACTION_QUEUE_SIZE_SPI=2)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_FULL_LL_DRIVER)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_HAL_DRIVER)
    add_definitions(-D__CMSIS_RTOS)
    add_definitions(-D__CORTEX_M4)
    add_definitions(-D__FPU_PRESENT=1)
    add_definitions(-D__MBED_CMSIS_RTOS_CM)
    add_definitions(-D__MBED__=1)

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Controller")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Mover")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Motors")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors/Button")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors/SHARPIR")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors/Ultrasonic")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Logger")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Logger/Serial Logger")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Type")
    include_directories("${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-mbed")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/build/nucleo_f401re")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Oled")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Oled/font")
    include_directories("${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/9.2.1")
    include_directories("${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/9.2.1/arm-none-eabi")
    include_directories("${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/9.2.1/include")
    include_directories("${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/9.2.1/include-fixed")
    include_directories("${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nucleo_f401re/*.*
    )
endif()

    add_definitions(-DTARGET_STM32F401xE)

    add_definitions(-DTOOLCHAIN_GCC_ARM)

    add_definitions(-DUSE_HAL_DRIVER)
    add_definitions(-D__CMSIS_RTOS)
    add_definitions(-D__CORTEX_M4)
    add_definitions(-D__FPU_PRESENT=1)
    add_definitions(-D__MBED_CMSIS_RTOS_CM)
    add_definitions(-D__MBED__=1)

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Controller")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Mover")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Motors")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors/Button")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors/SHARPIR")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors/Ultrasonic")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Logger")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Logger/Serial Logger")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Type")
    include_directories("${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-mbed")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/build/nucleo_f401re-9600")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Oled")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Oled/font")
    include_directories("${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/9.2.1")
    include_directories("${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/9.2.1/arm-none-eabi")
    include_directories("${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/9.2.1/include")
    include_directories("${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/9.2.1/include-fixed")
    include_directories("${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nucleo_f401re-9600/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "nucleo_f401re_debug")
    add_definitions(-DPLATFORMIO=60107)
    add_definitions(-DSTM32F4)
    add_definitions(-DSTM32F401xE)
    add_definitions(-DSTM32F40_41xxx)
    add_definitions(-DARM_MATH_CM4)
    add_definitions(-DCOMPONENT_FLASHIAP=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_ANALOGIN=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_FLASH=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_I2C=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_I2CSLAVE=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_I2C_ASYNCH=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_INTERRUPTIN=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_LPTICKER=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_MPU=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_PORTIN=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_PORTINOUT=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_PORTOUT=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_PWMOUT=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_RESET_REASON=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_RTC=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_SERIAL=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_SERIAL_ASYNCH=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_SERIAL_FC=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_SLEEP=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_SPI=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_SPISLAVE=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_SPI_ASYNCH=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_STDIO_MESSAGES=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_USTICKER=1)
    add_definitions(-DDEVICE_WATCHDOG=1)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_CORTEX)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_CORTEX_M)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_FF_ARDUINO)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_FF_MORPHO)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_LIKE_CORTEX_M4)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_LIKE_MBED)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_M4)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_MCU_STM32)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_MCU_STM32F4)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_MCU_STM32F401xE)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_NAME=NUCLEO_F401RE)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_NUCLEO_F401RE)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_RELEASE)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_RTOS_M4_M7)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_STM)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_STM32F4)
    add_definitions(-DTARGET_STM32F401xE)
    add_definitions(-DTOOLCHAIN_GCC)
    add_definitions(-DTOOLCHAIN_GCC_ARM)
    add_definitions(-DTRANSACTION_QUEUE_SIZE_SPI=2)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_FULL_LL_DRIVER)
    add_definitions(-DUSE_HAL_DRIVER)
    add_definitions(-D__CMSIS_RTOS)
    add_definitions(-D__CORTEX_M4)
    add_definitions(-D__FPU_PRESENT=1)
    add_definitions(-D__MBED_CMSIS_RTOS_CM)
    add_definitions(-D__MBED__=1)
    add_definitions(-D__PLATFORMIO_BUILD_DEBUG__)

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Controller")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Mover")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Motors")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors/Button")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors/SHARPIR")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors/Ultrasonic")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Logger")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Logger/Serial Logger")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Type")
    include_directories("${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-mbed")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/build/nucleo_f401re_debug")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Oled")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Oled/font")
    include_directories("${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/9.2.1")
    include_directories("${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/9.2.1/arm-none-eabi")
    include_directories("${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/9.2.1/include")
    include_directories("${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/9.2.1/include-fixed")
    include_directories("${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nucleo_f401re_debug/*.*
    )
endif()

FILE(GLOB_RECURSE SRC_LIST
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/*.*
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/*.*
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/test/*.*
)

list(APPEND SRC_LIST ${EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES})
